title: challenge
description: Describes high-level information for a challenge

manifestVersion.description: Version of manifest this schema is using, backend will validate this against what it currently supports

id.description: UUID for this challenge, must be unique amongst other challenges

slug.description: URL-friendly name for this challenge, must be unique within a challenge set

version.description: Version number for this challenge, should be incremented upon releases or changes

provisioner.description: Provisioner-backend that is used to create environments for this challenge
